name: LEGO Ninjago - The Video Game
description: You lead one of two warring parties in the game, which combines action and strategy in a unique way. On the battlefield, you have to prove that you are the ultimate fighting force. At the beginning you choose a side and choose one of two brothers who will lead your warriors. The Sensei Wu and Lord Garmadon siblings both have the same goal: to get the four golden weapons of the Spinjitzu. However, your motives could not be more different ...
